name: Depression_ClinicalGroupingCondition_HCPCS
title: Depression_Clinical Grouping Condition_HCPCS
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Depression Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute Depression Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: Depression Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: Depression Codes that constitute the Depression Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Screening for depression is documented as being positive and a follow-up plan is documented
Screening for depression documented as positive, follow-up plan not documented, reason not given
Dsm-iv-tr criteria for major depressive disorder not documented at the initial evaluation, reason not otherwise specified
Adult patients 18 years of age or older with major depression or dysthymia who reached remission at twelve months as demonstrated by a twelve month (+/-60 days) phq-9 or phq-9m score of less than 5

Adult patients 18 years of age or older with major depression or dysthymia who did not reach remission at twelve months as demonstrated by a twelve month (+/-60 days) phq-9 or phq-9m score of less than 5. either phq- 9 or phq-9m score was not assessed or is greater than or equal to 5
Documentation stating the patient has had a diagnosis of bipolar disorder
Adolescent patients 12 to 17 years of age with major depression or dysthymia who reached remission at twelve months as demonstrated by a twelve month (+/-60 days) phq-9 or phq-9m score of less than 5

Adolescent patients 12 to 17 years of age with major depression or dysthymia who did not reach remission at twelve months as demonstrated by a twelve month (+/-60 days) phq-9 or phq-9m score of less than 5. either phq-9 or phq-9m score was not assessed or is greater than or equal to 5
